summary: This module implements a set of utilities for padding CuPy arrays. It includes low‑level helpers for calculating edge indices, linear ramps, and setting padded regions, as well as a high‑level pad function that can apply various padding modes (e.g., constant, reflect, wrap) to extend arrays along specified axes.
business_intent: Enable GPU‑accelerated array padding operations needed for scientific computing, image processing, and convolutional algorithms within the CuPy library.
